-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://nyctaxizoneadls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyctaxidata/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = True,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyctaxidata@nyctaxizoneadls.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = True,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyctaxidata@nyctaxizoneadls.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = True,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    ) AS [result]

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyctaxidata@nyctaxizoneadls.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        HEADER_ROW = True,
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0''
    ) AS [result]'


SELECT
    MAX(LEN(LocationID)) AS LengthLocationID,
    MAX(LEN(Borough)) AS LengthBorough,
    MAX(LEN(Zone)) AS Lengthzone,
    MAX(LEN(service_zone)) AS Maxservicezone
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyctaxidata@nyctaxizoneadls.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = True,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    )WITH
    ( LocationID SMALLINT,
    Borough VARCHAR(100),
    Zone VARCHAR(100),
    service_zone VARCHAR(100)
    ) AS [result]


SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyctaxidata@nyctaxizoneadls.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = True,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    )WITH
    ( LocationID SMALLINT,
    Borough VARCHAR(100),
    Zone VARCHAR(100),
    service_zone VARCHAR(100)
    ) AS [result]


SELECT name,collation_name FROM sys.databases

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyctaxidata@nyctaxizoneadls.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = True,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    )WITH
    ( LocationID SMALLINT ,
    Borough VARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    Zone VARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    service_zone VARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
    ) AS [result]
